document_data.name: Heartblood
document_data.mainbody: '''Heartbloods''' were members of the clergy of the [[Cult of Karsus]] dedicated to [[Karsus]], the Momentary God.
document_data.Activities: The Cult of Karsus extinguished before any formal titles for the clergy's hierarchy could be devised.
document_data.Possessions: Heartbloods wore crimson [[robe]]s with [[gold]] and [[silver]] filigree. The only weapons there were permitted to carry were [[dagger]]s, [[dart]]s, and [[staff|staves]].
